remarks: Simplify the cardinal ` A ^ NN ` of ~ hausmapdom to ` ~P B = 2 ^ B ` when ` B ` is an infinite cardinal greater than ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
hauspwdom.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
hauspwdom $p |- ( ( ( J e. Haus /\ J e. 1stc /\ A C_ X ) /\ ( A ~<_ ~P B /\ NN ~<_ B ) ) -> ( ( cls ` J ) ` A ) ~<_ ~P B ) $.
